arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
english: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “To whom belong the earth and all those on it, if you ˹really˺ know?”
name: سورة المؤمنون

english: They will reply, “To Allah!” Say, “Why are you not then mindful?”
name: سورة المؤمنون

arabic: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
english: ˹And˺ ask ˹them˺, “Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the Mighty Throne?”
name: سورة المؤمنون

english: They will reply, “Allah.” Say, “Will you not then fear ˹Him˺?”
name: سورة المؤمنون
